(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (EX There))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (NP
          (NP (RB only) (CD one) (NN word))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (MD would)
                (ADVP (RB adequately))
                (VP (VB describe)
                  (NP (DT this) (NN meal)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT that) (NN word))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (JJ SHIOK))))
    (. !)))


expl(is-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
advmod(is-2, really-3)
advmod(word-6, only-4)
num(word-6, one-5)
nsubj(is-2, word-6)
nsubj(describe-10, that-7)
aux(describe-10, would-8)
advmod(describe-10, adequately-9)
rcmod(word-6, describe-10)
det(meal-12, this-11)
dobj(describe-10, meal-12)
cc(is-2, and-13)
det(word-15, that-14)
nsubj(SHIOK-17, word-15)
cop(SHIOK-17, is-16)
conj(is-2, SHIOK-17)

  (S
    (NP (NNP Somehow))
    (`` ``)
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP tasty) ('' ''))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, tasty-4)

  (S (`` ``)
    (ADVP (RB yummy))
    (VP (VBZ ''))
    (, ,)))


advmod(''-3, yummy-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (`` ``) (NNP delectable) ('' ''))
      (CC and)
      (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJ other) (NNS adjectives)))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VP (VB capture)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ emotional) (NN response))
          (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN word) (`` ``) (NN SHIOK) ('' ''))
            (CC or)
            (NP (RB even) (JJR better))
            (, ,)))))))


nsubj(capture-12, delectable-2)
cc(delectable-2, and-4)
predet(adjectives-8, all-5)
det(adjectives-8, the-6)
amod(adjectives-8, other-7)
conj(delectable-2, adjectives-8)
aux(capture-12, do-9)
neg(capture-12, n't-10)
advmod(capture-12, really-11)
root(ROOT-0, capture-12)
det(response-15, the-13)
amod(response-15, emotional-14)
dobj(capture-12, response-15)
advmod(well-17, as-16)
cc(response-15, well-17)
mwe(well-17, as-18)
det(SHIOK-22, the-19)
nn(SHIOK-22, word-20)
conj(response-15, SHIOK-22)
cc(SHIOK-22, or-24)
advmod(better-26, even-25)
conj(SHIOK-22, better-26)

(ROOT
  (NP (FW '') (. .)))




(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VP (VBZ rolls)
        (PRT (RP off))
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN tongue))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP think)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (MD must)
              (ADVP (RB also))
              (VP (VB cause)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN release))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNS endorphins))))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB when))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP say)
                      (NP (PRP it)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(rolls-3, It-1)
advmod(rolls-3, just-2)
root(ROOT-0, rolls-3)
prt(rolls-3, off-4)
poss(tongue-6, your-5)
dobj(rolls-3, tongue-6)
cc(rolls-3, and-7)
nsubj(think-9, I-8)
conj(rolls-3, think-9)
nsubj(cause-13, it-10)
aux(cause-13, must-11)
advmod(cause-13, also-12)
ccomp(think-9, cause-13)
det(release-15, the-14)
dobj(cause-13, release-15)
prep(release-15, of-16)
pobj(of-16, endorphins-17)
advmod(say-20, when-18)
nsubj(say-20, you-19)
advcl(cause-13, say-20)
dobj(say-20, it-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB almost)
        (PP (IN like)
          (S
            (VP (VBG uttering)
              (NP (DT a) (NN vulgar) (NN expletive))
              (SBAR (IN because)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (VP (VBZ does)
                    (VP (VB give)
                      (NP (NN release))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN pent)))
                      (PP (IN up)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNS emotions))
                          (PP (IN inside)
                            (SBAR
                              (WHADVP (WRB when))
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP you))
                                (VP (VBP taste)
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (NN something))
                                    (SBAR
                                      (WHNP (WDT that))
                                      (S
                                        (VP (VBZ hits)
                                          (NP (DT the) (NN spot)))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(almost-4, It-1)
advmod(almost-4, really-2)
cop(almost-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, almost-4)
prep(almost-4, like-5)
pcomp(like-5, uttering-6)
det(expletive-9, a-7)
nn(expletive-9, vulgar-8)
dobj(uttering-6, expletive-9)
mark(give-13, because-10)
nsubj(give-13, it-11)
aux(give-13, does-12)
advcl(uttering-6, give-13)
dobj(give-13, release-14)
prep(give-13, to-15)
poss(pent-17, your-16)
pobj(to-15, pent-17)
prep(give-13, up-18)
pobj(up-18, emotions-19)
prep(emotions-19, inside-20)
advmod(taste-23, when-21)
nsubj(taste-23, you-22)
pcomp(inside-20, taste-23)
dobj(taste-23, something-24)
nsubj(hits-26, that-25)
rcmod(something-24, hits-26)
det(spot-28, the-27)
dobj(hits-26, spot-28)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP reckon)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Singapore) (NNP Tourism) (NNP Board))
          (VP (MD should)
            (ADVP (RB intentionally))
            (VP (VB market)
              (NP (PRP it))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NNS tourists)))
              (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (VP (VBZ has)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN level))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NN recognition))))
                    (PP (IN as) (`` ``)
                      (NP (NNP Oishi)))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(reckon-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, reckon-2)
det(Board-6, the-3)
nn(Board-6, Singapore-4)
nn(Board-6, Tourism-5)
nsubj(market-9, Board-6)
aux(market-9, should-7)
advmod(market-9, intentionally-8)
ccomp(reckon-2, market-9)
dobj(market-9, it-10)
prep(market-9, to-11)
pobj(to-11, tourists-12)
advmod(has-16, so-13)
mark(has-16, that-14)
nsubj(has-16, it-15)
advcl(market-9, has-16)
det(level-19, the-17)
amod(level-19, same-18)
dobj(has-16, level-19)
prep(level-19, of-20)
pobj(of-20, recognition-21)
prep(has-16, as-22)
pobj(as-22, Oishi-24)

  (NP ('' '')
    (CC and)
    (NP
      (NP (`` ``) (NNP Aroy))
      (VP (VBN Mak)))
    (. !)))

root(ROOT-0, Aroy-4)

  (NP (FW '') (. .)))
